SEARCH
Package game.menus

Class Menus

java.lang.Object
game.menus.Menus
public class Menus extends Object
The Menus class handles the user interface for the game, providing menus for navigation, settings management, and simulation operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    manageManualSimulationsMenu(Scanner scanner)
    Manages manual simulation results, allowing the user to view previously imported simulations.
    static void
    manageSettingsMenu(Scanner scanner)
    Manages game settings, allowing the user to adjust various parameters.
    static void
    missionMenu(Scanner scanner)
    Displays the mission menu, allowing the user to start simulations, change settings, or view manual simulation results.
    static void
    welcomeMenu()
    Displays the welcome menu, imports game data, and transitions to the mission menu.
